metaTitle: Sell Salon Le Mesnil | Blanc de Blancs | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Salon Champagne. We buy all vintages of Salon Le Mesnil Blanc de Blancs. Direct offers for this rare Chardonnay.
heroSubhead: We buy Salon Le Mesnil Blanc de Blancs.
introParagraph: Salon is one of the rarest Champagnes, produced from a single grape (Chardonnay), a single village (Le Mesnil-sur-Oger), and only in exceptional vintages (roughly 4 times a decade). We purchase every vintage of Salon produced. If you have a single bottle or a wooden case, we offer top market value.
whatWeBuy: Salon Le Mesnil Blanc de Blancs (all vintages)
whatWeDoNotBuy: Delamotte (sister house, unless part of collection)
conditionFactors: Label condition (Green Salon labels can scuff)
pricingFactors: Vintage rarity (e.g., 2008 was only released in Magnums in the special box set)

faqs.question: Why is Salon so expensive?
faqs.answer: It is produced only in great years and held back for an average of 10 years before release. Production is tiny.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 2008 Magnum?
faqs.answer: Yes, the 2008 was released uniquely only in magnums as part of a special case. It is extremely valuable.

faqs.question: Do you buy Delamotte?
faqs.answer: We buy Delamotte if it is part of a larger cellar, but our primary focus is Salon.

faqs.question: Do you buy empty bottles?
faqs.answer: No, we only buy full, sealed bottles.

faqs.question: Is 1996 a good year?
faqs.answer: 1996 is considered one of the greatest vintages for Salon due to high acidity and longevity.

faqs.question: How do I sell my case?
faqs.answer: If you have a full wooden case (OWC), do not open it. Take photos of the case stamps and seals.
